title: Women in STEM Mixer
description: A networking event connecting students and professionals in STEM fields. Open to all students. Free snacks provided!

title: Hack the Hill 2025
description: A 24-hour hackathon open to all skill levels. Prizes, mentorship, and late-night pizza!

title: Cultural Night Gala
description: An evening celebrating diverse cultures through music, dance, and food.

title: Mental Health & Mindfulness Workshop
description: Interactive session on stress relief, mindfulness, and wellness techniques.

title: Startup Pitch Competition
description: Watch student entrepreneurs pitch their startups to a panel of judges and win seed funding.

title: Paint & Vibe
description: Relaxing painting session with music and snacks. No experience needed!

title: Climate Action Panel
description: Experts discuss climate policy, youth activism, and sustainability goals.

title: Code & Coffee: Beginner Python
description: A chill Python workshop for beginners. Bring your laptop, coffee’s on us!

title: Summer Research Info Session
description: Learn how to apply for research programs and find a faculty supervisor.

title: Afrobeats Dance Workshop
description: Learn Afrobeats choreography in a high-energy beginner-friendly dance class!

title: Resume Roast & Pizza Night
description: Bring your resume for peer and mentor feedback... and free pizza.

title: DIY Self-Care Night
description: Make face masks, decorate journals, and relax with friends.

title: Latte Art Throwdown
description: Compete or spectate in a latte art competition. Winner gets a gift card!

title: Trivia Night: Pop Culture Edition
description: Join us for a fun night of trivia and prizes. Teams of 4 max.

title: Black Student Association BBQ
description: Games, music, and grilled food — open to all students!

title: Women in Tech Panel
description: Hear from inspiring women in software, AI, and cybersecurity.

title: Sustainability DIYs
description: Make your own beeswax wraps, upcycled decor, and more.

title: LinkedIn Headshot Pop-Up
description: Get a free professional headshot — no appointment needed.

title: Board Game Café Night
description: Free entry for uOttawa students. First drink on us!

title: Academic Writing Bootcamp
description: Hands-on workshop to improve your writing and citation skills.
